reviews.review: 什么东西，匹配还老是错误，玩了挺久的游戏，做成这样也是醉了，屠夫老是增强，人类是傻逼对吧，最气的是，有时候有人掉网了，还会消耗掉自己的祭品，也是醉了，最好平衡一点，否则都没有什么人玩了

fun, but need to fix the hitboxs

Only get the game if you have 3+ friends who play. 

This game suffer from the worst hitboxes I've seen in a minute, avoid it if stuff like this really irks you.

The learning curve is steep - you'll lose a lot, on the survivor and killer side, but winning feels rewarding and well earned, especially when you're a solo survivor (which you shouldn't do; ironic I know). You'll suffer without good perks - but the lack of perks makes you have to think how you play without them, primarily how you handle outsmarting the killer you're running from or the survivors you're chasing. The perks come later when you can make certain builds that play a very specific way, which makes you a valuable part of a team on the survivor side (again, best played with friends). 

But yeah - good with friends, dodge like a bullet if you're solo unless you enjoy a painful early game experience.

A large fraction of the community is also very toxic. Expect to be called names post game.

Who knew that a game of hide-and-seek would have such a toxic community?
Can't not love it.

Growing fanbase, devs ramping up production of cosmetics and bug fixes as well, even if they let annoying things like hitboxes go unfixed for far too long.  Horror aspect wears off after awhile but the gameplay can still be fun, especially with friends who play.  It's easy to meet people to party up with, so even if you don't have irl friends (ya loser) that play, you can still get more than your money's worth out of it.  Be warned though, you will be trolled and griefed, so if you haven't dealt with toxic gamers before it might be a bit of a shock.
its very fun
I hate my friends

I think if you like Left 4 Dead and PAYDAY you might like this game. Its kind of a mix of the two. The horror aspect (L4D) and 4 survivor co-cop thing (L4D & PD) with the character leveling aspect (PD) but then the twist of having another person play the killer that you gotta go up against. I think it is a lot of fun. Tho it does kinda suck getting a match as the killer, the queues seem to be pretty long. All in all though, I enjoyed it.

I've only ever heard about the game on some vids but never gave it a shot. Almost 230 hours in I can say that its well worth the buy. Its a fun game to play with friends or solo, but even then its does have its issues. Some people can be toxic but what game doesn't have that these days, balance could be argued but its not terrible. I do recommend this game, its fun to play and sure beats playing the same old FPS all the time. Give it a try, you might end up liking it like I did :)
Get the game when its on sale for sure, there are more players at that time and plus there is a chance that there is DLC coming up soon like a new killer and such.

惊险刺激的游戏。一开始入坑可能会很迷茫，基本上遇见屠夫就秒跪。随着技能完善和熟悉地图，渐渐地恐怖游戏变成了搞笑游戏。每一次心跳的开始都意味着一场紧张的追逐。一路上BUG杀鸡让我遇见了无数大佬，也遇到了许多神仙。卡板子，双屠夫，卡树里.....每一次更新都在修复BUG和创造更多BUG。 即便如此，遇到这些的时候并不会说这游戏有多么不好，只会说一句”I think we did a pretty good job so far" 罢了，因为制作组真的很关心玩家们。

I can safely say after 800 hours of game time that this game is a gem. It's the perfect balance of infuriating keyboard slam moments and super happy exciting memories :) 

It stays fresh through regular dlc and the fact you have no idea what killer you're going to get as survivor, or those moments where you think you're going to lose as killer but somehow pullout the clutch 4 kill game.

Um jogo bom, embora sinta falta de combater o assassino(como em Friday 13) dá para ter bastante diversão. Ao que parece os Devs são atentos a comunidade e lançam surveys e atts para melhorar o jogo e a interação da propria comunidade. Meio desbalanceado as vezes, e não recomendado para se levar a serio nesses casos(senão você infarta), fora isso tá tudo tranquilo ou não.

Obs: 

-Os DEVs  tão cagando para a galera que joga com os killers apelões, afinal eles são pagos.
- Killers muito Overpowers + players doentes = TUNELAGEM(camperar após enganchar um sobrevivente)
- Aparentemente nada vai mudar esse quadro do jogo, e como 80% da galera não joga com squad fechado de sobreviventes, só deita e chora(meu caso, killers apelões eu quito logo)
- O Fod.a é que mesmo com isso tudo o jogo é daorinha, mas os devs n tao nem ai pros Killer OP, e é ai que entra os sobreviventes fodões(não é o meu caso mas acho bonito quando eles tão lá dando olé nos Killers kkkk)

Really addictive, even more so after they introduced the Archives

I'm writing this review as I'm hanging from a hook, left to die by random teammates.

In this game, you can play as either one of four survivors (who are either random players or your friends) and die to a nasty, nasty killer, or you can choose to be the killer and try to kill survivors.

Now, here's the thing: when you're playing as survivor, you WILL get matched with literal children who have no clue what they're doing; when you're playing as killer, you will get matched against a team of the most competent galaxy-sized brain survival experts. 

Do yourself a favour and only play the game with friends so you can at least share that suffering and bond over trauma, innit?

Okay,
I have been playing this game since it first came out. I mean literally 2 days after it was released. This game has come a FAR way of ups and downs. It has had its problems and it still does. However, this game is nothing short of absolute fun! I love playing survive with friends. Sometimes I even like to get into some killer action. Yes, the game is repetitive when it comes to objection-- but so is Call of Duty? Nothing happens the same in every match I go into. I always have awesome plays and sometimes even some awful plays that are just fun to laugh at. So would I recommend this game? Hell yeah, I have 1400 hours and plan on getting 1400 more. Oh, and the DLC is amazing.
